definition: house with more than 1 story/storied building/floor/CL:層|层[ceng2],座[zuo4],棟|栋[dong4]

sentences.english: Is below, two handsome Wei extraordinary man, all care anything on the city fortress.
sentences.chinese: 旗下，两个俊伟不凡的男子，都注目于城楼上的一切。

sentences.english: Seeing the mountain scenery from the city gate tower, I suddenly heard a hubbub in the city.
sentences.chinese: 我正在城楼上观山景，忽然听见城下乱纷纷。

sentences.english: From the balcony above the emperor would review his armies and perform ceremonies marking the starting of the new lunar year.
sentences.chinese: 在城楼上皇帝可以简约他的军队，观看新年节目。

sentences.english: Moreover, he stood on the Tiananmen rostrum, announcing its foundation.
sentences.chinese: 还有，他曾站在天安门城楼上，宣告新中国的成立。

sentences.english: And he shall set engines of war against thy walls, and with his axes he shall break down thy towers.
sentences.chinese: 他必安设撞城锤攻破你的墙垣，用铁器拆毁你的城楼。

sentences.english: The observatory can easily be noticed in the landscape thanks to the eight astronomy instruments which ornate the tower.
sentences.chinese: 你可以很容易看到它，城楼顶部是八台观天仪器。

sentences.english: Have you seen the tower-shape structure integrated in the ancient wall of the city?
sentences.chinese: 你看见那个城楼形状的建在古城墙上的建筑了吗？

sentences.english: A day of the trumpet and alarm against the fenced cities, and against the high towers.
sentences.chinese: 是吹角呐喊的日子，要攻击坚固城和高大的城楼。

sentences.english: Unexpectedly, a fire broke out on each of the city's towers. There was chaos inside the city.
sentences.chinese: 此时各城楼突然大火四起，城中顿时大乱。

sentences.english: LeiYuan choose to continue to use bamboo gun barrel, used to attack the enemy towers.
sentences.chinese: 雷远选择继续利用竹子做炮筒，用来攻击敌人的城楼。

sentences.english: The Square City is the symbolic building of the Ming Tomb's underground palace.
sentences.chinese: 四方城是明孝陵地下宫城的象征性城楼。

sentences.english: City fortress taint emptily and nor person, the public after scattering in disorder all escapes everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 城楼土空荡荡地无一人，人心散乱后皆是四处逃逸。

sentences.english: Two temples are independent quadrangle jade emperor hall is the type of gate tower wei type grand sight.
sentences.chinese: 两寺均为独立的四合院，玉皇殿为城楼式，蔚式壮观。

definition: enceinte of a city gate/barbican entrance to a city
Gaotai county in Zhangye 張掖|张掖[Zhang1 ye4], Gansu
Imperial City, inner part of Beijing, with the Forbidden City at its center
